title: Malaiyoram Veesum Kaatru Lyrics Paadu Nilave Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Malaiyoram Veesum Kaatru
Movie : Paadu Nilave
Music : Ilayaraja
Singer(s) : S. P. Balasubrahmanyam
Lyrics: Vaali

Malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkudhaa ? kekkudhaa ?
malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkudhaa ? kekkudhaa ?

Aararo paadinaalum aararo aagathamma
sonthangal thedinaalum thandhai thaai aagathamma
ennoda thaai thantha paatu thanamma
malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkutha ? kekkutha ?

Vaan parantha then sittu naan pudikka varatha ?
kallirukkum rosa poo kaikalakka koodatha?
raapozhuthu aana un raagangal thaana ?
anbe soll naana thoda aagatha aana ?
ull moochu vanginen
ull meethu thoonginen
illaatha baramellam nenjodu thanginen
nilava naalum thedum vaanam naan

Malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkutha ? kekkutha ?

Kuththalathu then aruvi sittaada thaan kattaadha
sittaadaiya katti yezha kaiyil vanthu kittaadha
aathoram nanal poongathodu aada
avaram poovil athu dhevaaram paada
inga naan kaathirukka en paarvai poothirkka
engeyo nee irunthu en meethu porthodukka
kollaathe pavam intha jeevan than

Malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkutha ? kekkutha ?
malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkutha ? kekkutha ?

Aararo paadinaalum aararo aagathamma
sonthangal thedinaalum thandhai thaai aagathamma
ennoda thaai thantha paatu thanamma
malaiyoram veesum kaathu
manasodu paadum paatu kekkutha ? kekkutha ?
